Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory9.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "While we're still capable to keep fighting, I'd advise retreating for now, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: "What's happening there?", 3: '8', 4: "Let's head that way, Bianca!", 5: '9'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Understood, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'It looks like a fight. It appears that the Support Force is fighting against...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct', 3: "We didn't do anything, I swear... Why are you attacking us?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Stop it, now!', 3: '19', 4: 'Bianca, stop them.', 5: '17'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'll keep them away with my arrows.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Member', 3: "Your ID... You're the one from Gray Raven, aren't you? And the Construct with you... is that Bianca?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Purifying Force Member', 3: 'What are you doing here?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I should be the one asking you. Why are you attacking the Support Force?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Member', 3: 'Because they looked terrified the moment they saw us and started running away.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct', 3: 'That was because you guys all unholster your weapons... I thought you were going to...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Member', 3: 'To what?!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "Enough! Isn't this the reason why the other Constructs are so terrified of the Purifying Force?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Member', 3: "So what? We're now suspecting deserters in the Support Force, so get out of my face.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ignore them, Bianca.', 3: '31', 4: 'Is everyone from the Purifying Force as impulsive as you?', 5: '31'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Member', 3: "This isn't your jurisdiction, Gray Raven Commandant.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "But it is. These people from the Support Force are on a joint operation with Gray Raven, so they're very much affiliated with the Gray Raven Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Member', 3: "You're not letting Gray Raven challenge the Purifying Force, are you, Bianca?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Of course not, seeing that I'm also part of the Purifying Force. We can give it a shot right nowâ€”Purifying Force versus Purifying Force.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Member', 3: '...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Member', 3: '...Tch. Goddamn fence sitter.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Member', 3: "That's why you're on a regular Task Force instead of fully here with us, isn't it? Fence sitter.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Take it back.', 3: '39', 4: 'Do you feel proud attacking one of your own?', 5: '39'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "That's alright, Commandant. They're not going to do anything after we clarify the Purifying Force's stance.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'So please follow my lead and be patient.', 4: '1'}
